title: Asset manager Schroders appoints Marc Brookman as CEO of North America division

Asset manager Schroders appoints Marc Brookman as CEO of North America division

Stock Markets 18 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 10:46AM ET)

© Reuters. Asset manager Schroders appoints Marc Brookman as CEO of North America division (Reuters) - British asset manager Schroders Plc (L: ) on Tuesday appointed Marc Brookman as chief executive officer of its North America division. Brookman, who joined the firm as deputy CEO of the division last year, will replace Karl Dasher in his new role by the end of the year.
